post:
Welcome to PakCloudHost
Our aim is to provide quality web hosting services to clients. Our data centers are located in different locations in the world. Currently we are offering VPS offers to clients.

**Our Common VPS features:**
* SSD Space
* 1 Gbps Uplink speed
* 2 Dedicated IPv4 Addresses
* DDoS Protection
* SolusVM Control Panel
* TUN/TAP, PPP, Docker, FUSE Available
* Full Root Access
* Customizable rDNS/PTR
* 99.9% Uptime
* 24/7/365 Technical Support

Packages:
**VPS 30GB**
* 30 GB Pure-SSD Storage Space (RAID-10 + BBU)
* 1 GB Dedicated RAM
* Unmetered Inbound Bandwidth
* 2,000 GB Outbound Bandwidth (per month)
* 10 Dedicated IPv6 Addresses (more available free of charge)
* 1 CPU Core
* Price: $12.20/year
Order Link: https://www.pakcloudhost.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=66

**VPS 60GB**
* 60 GB Pure-SSD Storage Space (RAID-10 + BBU)
* 2 GB Dedicated RAM
* Unmetered Inbound Bandwidth
* 3,000 GB Outbound Bandwidth (per month)
* 10 Dedicated IPv6 Addresses (more available free of charge)
* 1 CPU Core
* Price: $30.01/year
Order Link: https://www.pakcloudhost.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=67

**VPS 60GB**
* 70 GB Pure-SSD Storage Space (RAID-10 + BBU)
* 2.5 GB Dedicated RAM
* Unmetered Inbound Bandwidth
* 4,000 GB Outbound Bandwidth (per month)
* 10 Dedicated IPv6 Addresses (more available free of charge)
* 1 CPU Core
* Price: $30.01/year
Order Link: https://www.pakcloudhost.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=68
